activities.name: HZN_NSIP_Data_Copy
activities.description: This is copying data based on an SQL script to gather correct NSIP data from Horizon

source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH 
StringFields(ID, Vernum, ProjectName, ProjectStatus, ExamTimetablePublishStatus, 
			Sector, ProjectType, Stage, CaseReference, ProjectLocation, ProjectEmailAddress, 
			TwitterAccountName, Region, Easting, Northing, Transboundary, WelshLanguage, 
			ExASize, MapZoomLevel, ProjectDescription, SoS, TenE) AS
       (SELECT 
			Id, VerNum, [8], [23], [26], [17], [18], [19], [10], [2], [11], [15], [22], [12], [13], [28], [24], [20], [14], [9], [21], [27]
       FROM 
			(SELECT Id, VerNum, AttrID, ValStr 
			FROM LLAttrData 
			WHERE 
				DefID = 12361638 
				AND AttrID IN (2, 8, 23, 26, 17, 10, 11, 15, 18, 19, 22, 12, 13, 28, 24, 20, 14, 9, 21, 27)) AS Strings 
			PIVOT (MAX(ValStr) FOR AttrID IN ([2], [8], [23], [26], [17], [10], [11], [15], [18], [19], [22], [12], [13], [28], [24], [20], [14], [9], [21], [27])) AS StringsPivot),

DateFields(ID, Vernum, DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite, DateOfDCOAcceptance, AnticipatedDateOfSubmission, 
			AnticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific, DateOfDCOSubmission, DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen, 
			DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose, DateRRepAppearOnWebsite, ConfirmedStartOfExamination, 
			DateTimeExaminationEnds, Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate, Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline, 
			DateOfRecommendations, ConfirmedDateOfDecision, Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
			DateProjectWithdrawn, Section46Notification, DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject, 
			ScreeningOpinionSought, ScreeningOpinionIssued, ScopingOpinionSought, 
			ScopingOpinionIssued, DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision, DateSection58NoticeReceived, 
			PreliminaryMeetingStartDate, DeadlineForCloseOfExamination,	DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation, 
			DeadlineForDecision, JRPeriodEndDate, ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose
			) AS
       (SELECT 
			Id,VerNum,[3],[13],[5],[4],[12],[15],[16],[18],[21],[22],[24],[27],[25],[28],[30],[6],[11],[2], [7], [8], [9], [10], [14], [19], [20], [23], [26], [29], [31], [17]
       FROM 
			(SELECT Id, VerNum, AttrID, ValDate 
			FROM LLAttrData 
			WHERE 
				DefID = 12361641 
				AND AttrID IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 11, 12, 13, 15, 16, 18, 21, 22, 24, 25, 27, 28, 30, 2, 7, 8,9, 10, 14, 19, 20, 23, 26, 29, 31, 17)) AS Dates 
			PIVOT (MAX(ValDate) FOR AttrID IN ([3], [4], [5], [6], [11], [12], [13], [15], [16], [18], [21], [22], [24], [25], [27], [28], [30], [2], [7], [8], [9], [10], [14], [19], [20], [23], [26], [29], [31], [17])) AS DatesPivot),

TextFields(ID, Vernum, Summary) AS
       (SELECT Id,VerNum,[9]
       FROM 
			(SELECT Id, VerNum, AttrID, CAST(ValLong AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS TextField 
			FROM LLAttrData 
			WHERE 
				DefID = 12361638 
				AND AttrID IN (9)) AS Texts 
			PIVOT (MAX(TextField) FOR AttrID IN ([9])) AS TextsPivot),

StringFields_Applicant(ID, Vernum, PromoterName, ApplicantFirstName, ApplicantLastName, ApplicantEmailAddress, ApplicantWebAddress, ApplicantPhoneNumber, AddressLine1, AddressLine2, AddressTown, AddressCounty, PostCode) AS
       (SELECT Id, VerNum, [19], [3], [4], [10], [12], [11], [5], [6], [7], [8], [9]
	   FROM 
			(SELECT Id, VerNum, AttrID, ValStr 
			FROM LLAttrData 
			WHERE 
				DefID = 12361642 
				AND AttrID IN (19, 3, 4, 10, 12, 18, 11, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9)) AS Strings 
			PIVOT (MAX(ValStr) FOR AttrID IN ([19], [3], [4], [10], [12], [18], [11], [5], [6], [7], [8], [9])) AS StringsPivot),

TextFields_Applicant(ID, Vernum, ApplicantDescriptionOfProject) AS
       (SELECT Id, VerNum, [18]
       FROM 
			(SELECT Id, VerNum, AttrID, CAST(ValLong AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS TextField 
			FROM LLAttrData 
			WHERE 
				DefID = 12361642 
				AND AttrID IN (18)) AS Texts 
			PIVOT (MAX(TextField) FOR AttrID IN ([18])) AS TextsPivot),

StringFields_Case_Manager(DataId, ContactID, ContactDetails, TypeOfInvolvement) AS
       (SELECT d.DataId AS DataId, ll1.ValStr AS [ContactID], ll2.ValStr AS [ContactDetails], ll3.ValStr AS [TypeOfInvolvement]
       FROM DTree d
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll1 ON d.DataId = ll1.Id
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll2 ON d.DataId = ll2.Id
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll3 ON d.DataId = ll3.Id
       WHERE
		   ll1.DefId = 95501 AND ll1.AttrId = 20
		   AND ll2.DefId = 95501 AND ll2.AttrId = 19
		   AND ll3.DefId = 95501 AND ll3.AttrId = 3 AND ll3.ValStr = 'Case Manager'
		   AND ll1.ParentKeyId = ll2.ParentKeyId
		   AND ll1.ParentKeyId = ll3.ParentKeyId),

StringFields_Case_Officer(DataId, ContactID, ContactDetails, TypeOfInvolvement) AS
       (SELECT d.DataId AS DataId, ll1.ValStr AS [ContactID], ll2.ValStr AS [ContactDetails], ll3.ValStr AS [TypeOfInvolvement]
       FROM DTree d
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll1 ON d.DataId = ll1.Id
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll2 ON d.DataId = ll2.Id
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll3 ON d.DataId = ll3.Id
       WHERE
		   ll1.DefId = 95501 AND ll1.AttrId = 20
		   AND ll2.DefId = 95501 AND ll2.AttrId = 19
		   AND ll3.DefId = 95501 AND ll3.AttrId = 3 AND ll3.ValStr = 'Case Officer'
		   AND ll1.ParentKeyId = ll2.ParentKeyId
		   AND ll1.ParentKeyId = ll3.ParentKeyId),


StringFields_Inspector(DataId, ContactID, ContactDetails, TypeOfInvolvement) AS
       (SELECT d.DataId AS DataId, ll1.ValStr AS [ContactID], ll2.ValStr AS [ContactDetails], ll3.ValStr AS [TypeOfInvolvement]
       FROM DTree d
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll1 ON d.DataId = ll1.Id
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll2 ON d.DataId = ll2.Id
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll3 ON d.DataId = ll3.Id
       WHERE
		   ll1.DefId = 95501 AND ll1.AttrId = 20
		   AND ll2.DefId = 95501 AND ll2.AttrId = 19
		   AND ll3.DefId = 95501 AND ll3.AttrId = 3 AND ll3.ValStr = 'Inspector'
		   AND ll1.ParentKeyId = ll2.ParentKeyId
		   AND ll1.ParentKeyId = ll3.ParentKeyId)
       
SELECT 
	nsipcase.CreateDate AS CaseCreatedDate,
	s.ProjectName,
	s.ProjectStatus,
	s.ExamTimetablePublishStatus,
	s.Sector,
	s.ProjectType,
	s.Stage,
	s.CaseReference,
	s.ProjectLocation,
	s.ProjectEmailAddress,
	s.TwitterAccountName,
	s.Region,
	s.Easting,
	s.Northing,
	s.Transboundary,
	s.WelshLanguage,
	s.ExASize,
	s.MapZoomLevel,
	s.ProjectDescription,
	s.SoS,
	s.TenE,
	d.DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite,
	d.DateOfDCOAcceptance,
	d.AnticipatedDateOfSubmission,
	d.DateOfDCOSubmission,
	d.DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen,
	d.DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose,
	d.DateRRepAppearOnWebsite,
	d.ConfirmedStartOfExamination,
	d.DateTimeExaminationEnds,
	d.Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate,
	d.Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline,
	d.DateOfRecommendations,
	d.ConfirmedDateOfDecision,
	d.Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
	d.DateProjectWithdrawn,
	d.Section46Notification,
	d.DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject,
	d.ScreeningOpinionSought,
	d.ScreeningOpinionIssued,
	d.ScopingOpinionSought,
	d.ScopingOpinionIssued,
	d.DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision,
	d.DateSection58NoticeReceived,
	d.PreliminaryMeetingStartDate,
	d.DeadlineForCloseOfExamination,
	d.DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation,
	d.DeadlineForDecision,
	d.JRPeriodEndDate,
	d.ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose,
	t.Summary,
	sa.PromoterName,
	sa.ApplicantFirstName,
	sa.ApplicantLastName,
	sa.AddressLine1,
	sa.AddressLine2,
	sa.AddressTown,
	sa.AddressCounty,
	sa.PostCode,
	sa.ApplicantEmailAddress,
	sa.ApplicantWebAddress,
	sa.ApplicantPhoneNumber,
	ta.ApplicantDescriptionOfProject
FROM 
	Horizon_CaseReference cr 
		INNER JOIN Horizon_TypeOfCase toc ON cr.CaseTypeId = toc.ID
		INNER JOIN DTree nsipcase ON cr.CaseNodeId = nsipcase.DataID
		INNER JOIN StringFields s ON nsipcase.DataID = s.ID
		INNER JOIN DateFields d ON nsipcase.DataID = d.ID
		INNER JOIN TextFields t ON nsipcase.DataID = t.ID
		INNER JOIN StringFields_Applicant sa ON nsipcase.DataID = sa.ID
		INNER JOIN TextFields_Applicant ta ON nsipcase.DataID = ta.ID
WHERE
       toc.CaseworkType = 'NSIP'
	   and s.CaseReference = 'EN010118'
ORDER BY
	s.CaseReference

activities.name: NSIP_Additional_Data
activities.description: Additional NSIP Information

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
CR.CaseReference,
TOE.[Name] AS TypeOfExamination,
ET.[Name],
ET.[Description],
ET.[DeadlineStartDateTime],
ET.[Date],
ET.[Location]
FROM horizon_ExamTimetable ET
JOIN horizon_CaseReference CR on CR.CaseNodeID = ET.CaseId
JOIN horizon_TypeOfExamination TOE on TOE.ID = ET.ExaminationTypeID
;

activities.name: NSIP_Relevant_Representation
activities.description: SQL query to get Relevant Representation data to be linked to existing NSIP data

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
C.CaseReference
,C.CaseUniqueId
,C2.[ID] AS ContactID
,C2.[OrganisationName]
,C2.[JobTitle]
,C2.[FullName]
,C2.[PhoneNumber]
,C2.[EmailAddress]
,C2.[BuildingNumber]
,C2.[Street]
,C2.[Town]
,C2.[County]
,C2.[Country]
,C2.[Postcode]
,RR.[ID] AS RelevantRepID
,RR.[AttendPrelimMeeting]
,RR.[DateReceived]
,RR.[Notes]
,RR.[AgentContactId]
,RR.[RepresentAtCompAcqHearing]
,RR.[RepresentAtIssueHearing]
,RR.[RepresentAtOpenFloorHearing]
,RR.[RepresentationOriginal]
,RR.[RepresentationRedacted]
,RR.[SubmitLaterReps]
,RR.[WebReference]
,RRS.[Name] AS RelevantRepStatus
,RRL.[OwnerOrOccupier]
,RRL.[PowerToSell]
,RRL.[EntitledToClaim]
,RRL.[Other]
,RRL.[DescriptionIfOther]
,RRB.[Name] AS RelRepOnBehalfOf
,RRO.[Name] AS RelRepOrganisation
,COM.[Name] AS PreferredContactMethod
FROM [otcs].[dbo].[Horizon_RelevantRepresentation] RR
LEFT JOIN [otcs].[dbo].[Horizon_CaseReference] C ON RR.CaseId = C.CaseNodeId
LEFT JOIN [otcs].[dbo].[Horizon_RelevantRepContact] C2 ON RR.ContactId = C2.ID
LEFT JOIN [otcs].[dbo].[Horizon_TypeOfRelevantRepState] RRS ON RR.RepresentationStateId = RRS.ID
LEFT JOIN [otcs].[dbo].[Horizon_RelevantRepInterestInLand] RRL ON RR.InterestInLandId = RRL.ID
LEFT JOIN [otcs].[dbo].[Horizon_TypeOfRelRepOnBehalfOf] RRB ON RR.OnBehalfOfId = RRB.ID
LEFT JOIN [otcs].[dbo].[Horizon_TypeOfRelRepOrganisation] RRO ON RR.OrganisationTypeId = RRO.ID
LEFT JOIN [otcs].[dbo].[Horizon_TypeOfCommunicationPreference] COM ON RR.PreferredContactMethodId = COM.ID
